page.title: 04EDDERTON PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: {Edderton Primary School}is about 110 years old.There are 29 pupils in the school at present.School starts at 9.20am and finishes at 3.40p.m. The subjects taught are{Language Arts, {Maths,Environmental Studies,RE,PE, Art {and Music.}In the school there are only two full time teachers and four visiting subject specialist teachers. You start school at 5 years old and you leave Primary School at 12 years old.Then the children are bussed through to{Tain Royal Academy}to continue their education.{ The school is open for 6.5 hours a day,and 200 days a year.There is a 20 minute interval each day and a lunch hour when the pupils may buy a lunch. The children from 5 to 7 years old are taught in groups by the class teacher and the children from 7 to 12 years old are taught by the head teacher.
